thread.title: Woodside’s Bid for Oil Search is No Bargain
thread.title_full: Woodside’s Bid for Oil Search is No Bargain - WSJ

author: Abheek Bhattacharya
title: Woodside’s Bid for Oil Search is No Bargain
text:
Big oil companies should be capitalizing on the worst oil market in two decades by snapping up smaller firms at rock-bottom prices. So it’s puzzling to see Australian energy giant Woodside Petroleum bid so much for smaller rival Oil Search.
Woodside’s all-share offer values fellow Australian producer Oil Search’s shares at $7.9 billion, 16% more than Oil Search commanded before talk of such a deal surfaced on Aug. 28.
